subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: The Rangers’ Allen Craig had a run-scoring pinch hit for the second night in a row off Alexi Ogando. This postseason, Craig is 4 for 6 with four R.B.I. as a pinch hitter.
snippet: The Rangers’ Allen Craig had a run-scoring pinch hit for the second night in a row off Alexi Ogando. This postseason, Craig is 4 for 6 with four R.B.I. as a pinch hitter.
